result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ga: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.orig: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.html: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ponchtml: fuair siad faoiseaṁ ón ḃfuaċt nuair a ċuir siad a láṁa timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
